name: XIndicator
details: I created a fully functional SaaS from user sign up to user payment, which was a tool where you can build your custom trading indicator and back test it on stocks, cryptos, and NFTs.

name: Handstore
details: A mobile application for talented people to share their handmade products, and for people who are interested in buying great handmade products. In other word, a special place for handmade products.

name: SpiderAlgo
details: A web game where you are the spider and you has to eat the ant using one of the following algorithms: DFS, BFS, A* and more or you can pick an algorithm and allow the spider to start playing on its own depending on it.

name: MechaCoding
details: Instagram page where I explain many topics about software engineering including leetcode problems, Flutter topics, and much more.

name: A19
details: A simple UI design for a website where people can book an appointment to test for COVID-19
